result.execSummary:
The defendant Randy B Slaght was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randy B Slaght

Defendant Randy B Slaght in court with attorney Annamarie Amy Wineke.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Discussion held; Court questions def and reviews chgs and pens; no contest plea is entered; Court accepts plea and finds defendant guilty; parties heard; Court heard and sentence is imposed:

$100 + costs w/i 60 days or payment plan; Shall serve not beyond 20 days in the Dodge County Jail consec w/h&t for FTP

1:12 - Defendant Randy B Slaght appeared by video means w/Atty Moeller. Prosecuting Intern Kevin Schmidt w/Atty Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for State of Wisconsin. Not eligible;   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 bond with conditions:  Defendant shall not consume alcohol or other intoxicants.  Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety.  Return date scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 03:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for August 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.
